Abstract: John Tierney The Big City column wonders why citizens of world's most technologically advanced society celebrate future by gathering to watch ball slide down a pole; suggests more elaborate plan: to replace ball with huge illuminated swing shaped like crescent moon, which would transport leggy chorine across Times Square, accompanied by elaborate lights and holograms in the sky (M)
Snippet: John Tierney The Big City column wonders why citizens of world's most technologically advanced society celebrate future by gathering to watch ball slide down a pole; suggests more elaborate plan: to replace ball with huge illuminated swing shaped ...
LeadParagraph: ARE you already disappointed by the alleged new millennium?

Headline.Main: The Big City; Millennium? It's Really 1703!
